page.description: Gather statistical information about the actual table.
page.original:
SQL::TableInfo::UpdateStatistics() Syntax Result_Flag as L = .UpdateStatistics( as SQL::Connection ) ArgumentDescription Result_FlagIndicates whether the operation was successful. A SQL::TableInfo object. A SQL::Connection object.
Description The UpdateStatistics() method gathers information on the table for the specified connection. A successful call to UpdateStatistics()will set the LastKnownRowCount property and the MaximumActualLength (for character and binary columns) property for each DataTypeInfo(Column). See Also SQL::TableInfo Object Limitations Desktop applications only.
